channel.title: DVD writing program for windows?
channel.description:
You guys know any good DVD writing programs for windows?
I have a bunch of .avi files I need to burn, and i can't seem to find a good burning program for Windows...The issue I'm having, is if I burn the .avi to a DVD my DVD player wont play it because it knows it's a copied DVD, or something. I know there are programs that rip the audio from the video, then burn it. I have it on Linux, but I cant seem to find one for windows.

item.title: DVD writing program for windows?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

ImgBurn is a good burning program.

Read full topic
